8e064422b84d6e9d0b03cf87070ef45e:
Dosage Plan:
Hello! For this child, I recommend administering 300 mg of Acetaminophen every 4 to 6 hours, not to exceed 5 doses in a 24-hour period. For pain relief, 150 to 300 mg of Ibuprofen can be given every 6 to 8 hours. Follow doctor’s advice!

Interaction Plan:
Caution! Avoid giving alcohol to this child as it may increase the risk of liver damage with Acetaminophen and worsen stomach bleeding with Ibuprofen. Also, use Ibuprofen cautiously if the child has hypertension. Consult a doctor!
